Texts.Chs: 金星，太阳系中最热的行星，以一位古老的爱与美之神命名。当然，这个名字只是一个巧合，因为它是在第一次测量地球温度的100多年前被选中的。
Texts.Eng: Venus, the hottest planet in the solar system, named after an ancient deity of love and beauty. Of course, the name is a coincidence, as it was chosen more than 100 years before the first measurement of the planet's temperature.
